name: A Wizard's apprentice - BPW-1
description:
A wizard's apprentice is a game made for HKU game art's Building Playful Worlds 1. CREDITS AND ASSETS USED

Bronvermelding volgens MLA 9e Editie 

Assets gebruikt 

Wizard NPC - Dungeon Mason. “Mini Legion Lich PBR HP Polyart | Characters”. Unity Asset Store, 11 augustus 2017, assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/mini-legion-li ch-pbr-hp-polyart-91497. Geraadpleegd 22 december 2022. 

Boek - Ferocious Industries. “PBR Witchcraft Books Pack - 4K | 3D Props”. Unity Asset Store, 1 december 2022, assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/pbr-witchcraft-books-pack-4k-23930 6. Geraadpleegd 22 december 2022. 

Bomen + kleine paddenstoelen - HQP Studios. “Sweet Low Poly Forest Pack | 3D Environments”. Unity Asset Store, 22 augustus 2022, assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sweet-low-poly-forest-pack-2 29005. Geraadpleegd 22 december 2022. 

Material voor de particles van de fee - Mirza Beig. “Inferno VFX | Fire en Explosions”. Unity Asset Store, 14 mei 2017, assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fire-explosions/inferno-vfx-50735. Geraadpleegd 22 december 2022. 

Grote roze kristallen - SineVFX. “Translucent Crystals | 3D Fantasy”. Unity Asset Store, 15 januari 2018, assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/translucent-crystals106274. Geraadpleegd 22 december 2022
